topics.body:
So I'm kind of mad.

Max said that they were going to be streaming Xenoblade X on this Tuesday when I comes out right?

Well I go on his goddamn Twitter and for WHATEVER fucking reason they apparently streamed it _*8 hours ago*_.

He literally said they would stream on Tuesday not wait till fucking 4 at night and randomly start the stream. 

Does he actually expect people to stay up that late at night and not warn anybody about that shit? Like are you actually _serious?_

Honestly His streams are of high quality but there are these little things about them that have (Especially lately) been ruining them for me.

I'm honestly starting to want to do what I did to Game Grumps and just take a break from him at this point. 

Because this actually pisses me off, I was all ready. Did my laundry today, Had some Pizza I was going to make later tonight and everything.

I was all set to go and than I go on his stupid Twitter and see that. I'm actually legit mad now thinking more on it.
